segment.source: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed
segment.target: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed

segment.source: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed
segment.target: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed

segment.source: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed
segment.target: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed

segment.source: You can determine how you might deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise by evaluating your existing infrastructure, a review of which you can take advantage of for your deployment.
segment.target: You can determine how you might deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise by evaluating your existing infrastructure, a review of which you can take advantage of for your deployment.

segment.source: Determine How You Will Deploy MED-V
segment.target: Determine How You Will Deploy MED-V

segment.source: Because MED-V is a desktop-based solution, it works with your existing infrastructure.
segment.target: Because MED-V is a desktop-based solution, it works with your existing infrastructure.

segment.source: For example, if you currently deploy applications to physical computers by using an electronic software distribution system, you can also use your electronic software distribution system to deploy to MED-V workspaces.
segment.target: For example, if you currently deploy applications to physical computers by using an electronic software distribution system, you can also use your electronic software distribution system to deploy to MED-V workspaces.

segment.source: If you are currently using an electronic software distribution solution, you can use that to distribute MED-V workspaces and their dependent applications.
segment.target: If you are currently using an electronic software distribution solution, you can use that to distribute MED-V workspaces and their dependent applications.

segment.source: You can also use this solution for distribution of subsequent applications after MED-V is deployed.
segment.target: You can also use this solution for distribution of subsequent applications after MED-V is deployed.

segment.source: For more information about deploying MED-V with an ESD, see How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Through an Electronic Software Distribution System.
segment.target: For more information about deploying MED-V with an ESD, see How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Through an Electronic Software Distribution System.

segment.source: Whichever electronic software distribution solution that you use, you must be familiar with the requirements of your particular solution.
segment.target: Whichever electronic software distribution solution that you use, you must be familiar with the requirements of your particular solution.

segment.source: If you are using System Center Configuration Manager 2007 R2 or a later version, see the Configuration Manager Documentation Library in the Microsoft Technical Library (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=66999).
segment.target: If you are using System Center Configuration Manager 2007 R2 or a later version, see the Configuration Manager Documentation Library in the Microsoft Technical Library (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=66999).

segment.source: You might prefer to install MED-V in a Windows 7 image.
segment.target: You might prefer to install MED-V in a Windows 7 image.

segment.source: Then, after you deploy the Windows 7 images throughout your enterprise, MED-V is ready to be installed when an end user needs it.
segment.target: Then, after you deploy the Windows 7 images throughout your enterprise, MED-V is ready to be installed when an end user needs it.

segment.source: For more information, see How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace in a Windows 7 Image.
segment.target: For more information, see How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace in a Windows 7 Image.

segment.source: Define and Plan your MED-V Deployment
segment.target: Define and Plan your MED-V Deployment
